Context:
The Ontario Human Rights Commission Guide sections relevant to employment rights and supports include matters falling under the following policies and legislations at George Brown College: Human Rights Discrimination and Harassment Policy, Sexual Assault and Sexual Violence Policy and Protocol, AODA Accessibility Policy, and Freedom of Information and Protection of Privacy Act.
